div.bibl: Saloniki, June 19, 1926, p. 4 THE NEW FACTORY OF PANREX MANUFACTURING CO.

body.p: The Greek firm Panrex Manufacturing Co., which specializes in the manufacturing and selling of everything that shoe shining parlors use has moved to its new shop, 1854 W. Van Buren St. Owing to its ever-increasing business, the Company should be able to serve its costumers quicker and better than previously.
